name: Flick Field Goal Free
description:
Welcome to Flick Field Goal Free, the newest free American Football game to hit the App Store!

Featuring realistic ball physics that let you take a shot from just about anywhere on the field, Flick Field Goal is much more than a simple flicking game.

With an interface that changes color depending on your allegiance, you'll be able to show of your team colors proudly even before you send your team to the top of the online ladder (in the full version)!

Other features include a lush, fully 3D stadium and authentic crowd sounds to set the atmosphere. Realistic wind modelling will carry the ball just like it should, and a special training mode lets you practice your kicks from exactly where you want to!

Features:

* Realistic ball physics.
* Lush 3D graphics.
* A 3D overhead view that lets you pick where to take a shot from!
* Realistic wind effects - take aim at a post to allow for a crosswind.
* Choose your team colors and watch as the interface changes to show your support.
